name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF PHILADELPHIA, INC., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF PHILADELPHIA, INC., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is REVERSED. See, Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., — Pa. -, 650 A.2d 854 (1994).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
FLAHERTY, Justice,
dissenting.
I dissent based on my dissenting opinion filed in Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement, v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., — Pa. -, 650 A.2d 854.
opinions.author: FLAHERTY, Justice,

opinions.text:
CASTILLE, Justice,
dissenting.
I respectfully dissent based on my dissenting opinion filed in Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., — Pa.-, 650 A.2d 854.
opinions.author: CASTILLE, Justice,

attorneys: Stanley J. Wolowski, Pittsburgh, for Pa. St. Police.
Gary F. DiVito, Philadelphia, for Hosp. Invest.
casebody.head_matter:
PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF PHILADELPHIA, INC., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 18, 1993.
Decided Nov. 3, 1994.
Stanley J. Wolowski, Pittsburgh, for Pa. St. Police.
Gary F. DiVito, Philadelphia, for Hosp. Invest.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
